comments.raw_text: Gregory Szorc (:gps) has applied Clang's static analysis tools to our code base (see also https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Clang_Static_Analysis). This bug will be used to track all the resulting bug reports.

comments.creator: choller@mozilla.com
comments.author: choller@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Results can be seen here:
https://people.mozilla.org/~sledru/reports/fx-scan-build/
(need a mozilla login)
